name: Diablo killer
description:
This is my ARPG Project, where I try to mix best things from such games as Diablo and Crimsonland.

This is my first relatively big project, not created during several day jam.

Futher goals:

  • Expanded equipment system
  • Quest system
  • Persistent location between procedural generated landscapes
  • Melee combat system
  • Multiple characters, charcter picking
  • Stats system
  • Dialogue system
  • More enemies
  • More items
  • More assets
  • Random encounters
  • Random generated dangeons
  • Crafting system

Any comments and suggestion will be helpful.

Weapon asset and some sounds: https://github.com/tranek/GASShooter
Music: https://soundcloud.com/minimizer
Models: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/skeleton-crew-bundle
